Text:
Why on earth did you write DVDRip in the headline when it's the full DVD?

The "R" in "DVDR" is for replica like you write yourself while DVDRip is the CD sized crap some prefer.
Because I'm retarded. But hey, the size and category are right, so let it slide.

By the way, if anyone has full DVD requests, I have almost 200 DVDs, TV episodes, etc. Some rare shit, too. Make some requests, if it's needed. If I could find somewhere to upload a html list to, I would.
I'd like "Nine months" if you have. Would be really thankfull. Thanks for this one

This looks like a GREAT! flick with live ppl and animation. Only skimmed it.

FYI
PGCEdit 
I use that PGCEdit to make *good* and *clean* ISOs.  It "maps" file structure and spacing and fixes bad dvd mappings. Read about it, it's over my head.

PGCEdit says there's some problem with files in VIDEO_TS left over from Ripper.  

So I re-ripped with DVDshrink and then PGCEdit had no complaints.

Do not know if orig ISO would have been ok.
